prepared_by: Ramirez Structural Inc. — Jose Ramirez, PE
description: Foundation plan drawing for new ADU above existing garage, showing existing concrete slab, new grade beam (GB1), HSS 4x4x1/4 steel columns full height to roof, pad footings, continuous footings, WSWH 24x9 Simpson Strong-Walls, holdown (HDU2) locations, shearwall schedule, pad footing schedule, grade beam schedule, plan notes, and legend. Scale 1/4" = 1'-0". Red 'APPROVED' stamp present (Anthony Montez, Building Plan Check, 10/29/25).
key_content: Foundation plan for new ADU above existing garage at 1/4" = 1'-0" scale
Grade beam GB1: 12" wide x 24" deep, 3-#4 at top & 3-#4 at bottom, #3 stirrups @ 12" min.
Concrete minimum f'c = 3,000 PSI
Typical continuous footing: 1'-0" wide x 24" min. bearing depth into competent soil w/ continuous 2-#4 T&B
Shearwall Mark 1: STRUC 1, O.S., 10d nails, 6" edge / 12" field, SDS"x6" @ 16", A35 @ 16", 312 PLF
Allowable bearing pressure: 1,500 PSF
Pad footing min. bearing depth: 18" interior, 24" exterior
HSS 4x4x1/4 steel columns full height foundation to roof (detail S4.0) at multiple locations
WSWH 24x9 Simpson Wood Strong-Wall at two locations, 6'-0" apart
#5 @ 12" O.C. each way T&B rebar at strong wall footing area
Holdown hardware: HDU2 (Simpson) at corners and shearwall ends
3x side nailer per detail 10/S3.3 — edge nail shear wall to column in lieu of holdown
LPT5 at 16" O.C. staggered on each face of strong wall to nailer per detail 10/S5.0, TYP.
Anchor bolts: 7" min. embedment into concrete, 48" max. spacing, plate washer 0.299"x3"x3"
All wood framed structural walls: 2x4 studs @ 16" O.C. (2x6 @ 16" O.C. at plumbing walls)
Foundation sills: naturally durable or preservative-treated wood; fasteners silicon bronze/copper, stainless steel, or hot-dipped zinc coated
Existing 1'-0" wide continuous footing to be field verified (typical)
Existing 2x4 wall stud to be field verified
Existing concrete slab within garage footprint
GB1 grade beam with 2'-3" cantilever at each end
1.75x14 LVL stringers @ 12" O.C. at stair area
Shearwall detail references: 5/S3.1 & 7/S3.1 for wall type assemblies
Column detail reference: S4.0
Use common wire nails for all STRUC 1 sheathing
Use min. 8d common nails for LTP4 installed over sheathing
Use A35 @ 6" O.C. on Simpson Strong Wall
APPROVED: BAD0326126, City of Long Beach, 10/29/25, Anthony Montez — Building Plan Check
NOT SHOWN: vapor barrier notation
NOT SHOWN: slab rebar schedule (existing slab — not new construction)
NOT SHOWN: epoxy dowel specs for connection to existing foundation

drawing_zones.content: Plan Notes: 12 numbered structural notes covering coordination, dimensions, structural vs partition walls, foundation sills (PT wood), wall framing (2x4 @ 16" O.C.), anchor bolt specs (7" embedment, 48" spacing, plate washer), holdown anchors, shear wall sheathing, adverse soils, post-tensioned slab care

Legend: symbols for spread footings, wood post size marks, shear wall post/hardware (HDU2), wood shearwall (with schedule reference), new concrete footing (dashed lines + solid hatch), (E) concrete footing (dashed lines)

Shearwall Schedule: Mark 1 — STRUC 1 O.S., 10d nails, 6" edge / 12" field, SDS"x6" @ 16", A.B. @32"/48", A35 @ 16", 312 PLF. Notes on shearwall types (I-IV), wire nails, 8d common for LTP4, A35 @ 6" O.C. on Simpson Strong Wall

Pad Footing Schedule: 6 types (1.5 through 4.0), sizes from 1'-6" to 4'-0" square, all 12" thick, rebar #4 or #5, capacities 3.04 to 21.60 kips. Notes: min bearing 18" interior / 24" exterior, 1,500 PSF allowable bearing, holdown anchor pad governs if co-located
Conc. Grade Beam Schedule: GB1 — 12" wide x 24" deep, 3-#4 at top & 3-#4 at bottom, #3 stirrups @ 12" min. Notes: concrete min f'c = 3,000 PSI, min bearing depth into competent soil

Foundation Plan drawing at 1/4" = 1'-0": existing garage slab outline, new grade beam GB1 across top with 2'-3" cantilever each end, HSS 4x4x1/4 columns at perimeter and midpoints (full height to roof, detail S4.0), 4x4 wood posts, HDU2 holdowns at corners and shearwall ends, two WSWH 24x9 Simpson Strong-Walls at 6'-0" spacing, #5 @ 12" O.C. E.W. T&B at strong wall footings, existing 1'-0" cont. footing to be field verified, existing 2x4 wall stud to be field verified
Stair framing: 1.75x14 LVL stringers @ 12" O.C., hatched stair pattern, HSS 4x4x1/4 column at base (full ht. foundation to roof)
TYP. CONTINUOUS FOOTING: 1'-0" wide x 24" min. bearing depth into competent soil w/ continuous 2-#4 T&B

Callout notes: USE 3x SIDE NAILER per detail 10/S3.3, edge nail shear wall to column in lieu of holdown; TYP. WALL STUD FRAMING 2x4 studs @16" O.C.; USE LPT5 AT 16" O.C. staggered on ea. face of strong wall to nailer per detail 10/S5.0 TYP.; EXISTING 2x4 WALL STUD TO BE FIELD VERIFIED
Red APPROVED stamp — BAD0326126, City of Long Beach Electronic Plan Check, date 10/29/25, Anthony Montez - Building Plan Check
Drawing title: FOUNDATION PLAN, SCALE: 1/4" = 1'-0", with north arrow

Title block (rotated vertical): RAMIREZ STRUCTURAL INC., Jose Ramirez PE, C 91046, (562) 519-6045, jose@ramirezstructural.com, @rsi.plans, www.ramirezstructural.com, 326 FLINT AVE NEW ADU ABOVE (E) GARAGE, 326 FLINT AVE LONG BEACH CA 90814, Project No. 25-357, Date 9/19/25, Revision A 09-19-25, Sheet S2.0 FOUNDATION PLAN
